description: Initial Toast CSS created. Contains 4 primitive token refs (--t-raw-*) flagged for replacement. Hard-coded 320px, 480px, 3px values present.
Initial Toast spec created. Documents anatomy, JTBD, tokens, accessibility requirements, and known issues.

Nursery issues addressed: replaced --t-raw-blue-600 with var(--t-border-info, var(--t-interactive-default)), --t-raw-green-600 with var(--t-border-success, var(--t-fg-success)), --t-raw-amber-600 with var(--t-border-warning, var(--t-fg-warning)), --t-raw-red-600 with var(--t-border-danger). Added @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) block. Changed dismiss button min-height to var(--t-touch-min). Fixed --t-surface-0 to --t-surface-2 to match spec.

Spec synced with CSS implementation: removed stale knownIssues[0] referencing primitive tokens (already fixed), updated tokens.uses to list all 29 semantic tokens, added futureConsiderations section, corrected maturity to candidate.
Toast promoted to stable zone. maturity set to stable. shielded set to true. First component to complete full terarrium lifecycle.
Initial Toggle CSS created. Contains 2 primitive token refs: --t-raw-neutral-300 (track off-state) and --t-raw-neutral-0 (thumb fill). Missing prefers-reduced-motion. Known issues documented in spec.

Toggle spec created. Documents anatomy (container/input/track/thumb/label), JTBD, variants, tokens, accessibility requirements (role=switch, aria-checked, Space keyboard), and known issues including primitive token refs.
Toggle promoted from nursery to workshop. maturity set to candidate. Nursery agent reviews recorded. Ready for Workshop review cycle with real Anthropic API agent reviews.

Governance orchestrator created. Wires all 5 domain agents into a full review cycle. Calls real Anthropic API via agent-runner.mjs. Writes decisions to decisions.jsonl and activity to activity-log.jsonl.

Express API proxy server created. Endpoints: /api/chat (SSE streaming), /api/governance-review, /api/pipeline, /api/wiki, /api/seed-vault, /api/decisions, /api/activity. Proxies Anthropic API calls with CORS + key security.

Renamed ds-lead.mjs to system-steward.mjs. DS_LEAD export renamed to SYSTEM_STEWARD, buildDSLeadSystemPrompt to buildSystemStewardPrompt. Agent id changed from 'ds' to 'ss', title from 'Design System Lead' to 'System Steward', short from 'DS Lead' to 'Steward'. CLAUDE.md states 'There is no Design System Lead agent' — the name claimed authority the gardener reserves.

Fixed all rgba() calls to modern rgb() notation per project convention. 12 instances replaced: rgba(0,0,0,0.05) to rgb(0 0 0 / 5%) etc. Added 4 dark-specific primitives (--t-raw-red-950, --t-raw-amber-950, --t-raw-blue-950, --t-raw-green-950) and updated dark theme to reference them instead of hard-coded hex values.

Updated model IDs from claude-3-5-haiku-20241022 to claude-haiku-4-5-20251001 (REVIEW_MODEL) and claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022 to claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929 (CHAT_MODEL). Previous models were ~16 months old.

Cleared Toggle's stale agentReviews (pre-API synthetic reviews from BRRR session where all 5 agents returned api-unavailable). Removed brrr_note field. Toggle will get fresh reviews when orchestrator runs with a real API key.
Updated HANDOFF.md: renamed ds-lead.mjs reference to system-steward.mjs in file map, updated model IDs in chat section and architecture diagram from claude-3-5-* to claude-*-4-5.

Created gardener-config.json — per-agent personality dials (warmth, directness, metaphorDensity, formality, celebrationIntensity, critiqueStyle) with global defaults and per-agent overrides. Gardener can tune each agent's voice independently.

Created agent-voices.mjs — AGENT_VOICES profiles for all 6 agents (ts, ag, pl, ca, px, ss) with personality briefs, voice descriptions, critique examples at 7 style settings, celebration styles, and signature patterns. Exports buildPersonalityBlock(agentId, config) function.

Injected personality layer into agent system prompts. Added loadGardenerConfig() and reloadGardenerConfig() helpers. buildAgentSystemPrompt() now inserts personality block between ROLE/AUTHORITY and CONSTITUTIONAL PRINCIPLES. System Steward prompt builder receives config parameter.
Added personality injection to buildSystemStewardPrompt(). New config parameter (backward-compatible, defaults to null). Imports buildPersonalityBlock from agent-voices.mjs.
Added GET /api/gardener-config and POST /api/gardener-config endpoints. POST calls reloadGardenerConfig() to invalidate orchestrator's cached config. Added writeFileSync import.

Renamed src/library/index.html → src/library/live-editor.html to fix root URL hijacking. express.static was serving index.html at / before the redirect to storybook.html could fire. Now / correctly redirects to storybook.html (full 11-component storybook). Live editor remains accessible at /live-editor.html.

Governance chat now has tool-use capabilities via Anthropic function calling. 10 tools defined (5 read-only, 5 action): get_pipeline_state, get_component_details, get_recent_decisions, get_activity_log, get_wiki, run_governance_review, run_single_agent_review, promote_component, create_component, seed_vault_component. Agentic loop (max 5 turns) executes tools server-side and streams progress via SSE tool_start/tool_result events. UI shows inline tool-call indicators with spinner, success, and error states. Pipeline auto-refreshes after action tools.

Chat agent now has file-writing capabilities. 7 new tools added (1 read, 6 write): read_file, write_component_css, write_component_spec, patch_css, write_token_file, update_wiki, update_terrarium_css. Path safety module (file-safety.mjs) enforces allowlist — blocks governance source, server code, append-only JSONL, and path traversal. foundation.css only modifiable via patch_css. Every write auto-logs to changes.jsonl and activity-log.jsonl. Total tools: 17 (6 read, 5 governance, 6 file-write).
Chat agent patched CSS (1 replacements): src/components/toggle/toggle.css
